abstract: Bixi, which designs and builds bike-sharing systems used around the world, owes the city of Montreal millions of dollars.
snippet: Bixi, which designs and builds bike-sharing systems used around the world, owes the city of Montreal millions of dollars.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — The Canadian company that designs and builds the bicycles and supporting technology for bike-sharing systems around the world, including those in New York and London, sought bankruptcy protection on Monday.

headline.main: Canadian Company Behind Bike-Sharing Programs Seeks Bankruptcy Protection
headline.print_headline: Canadian Company Behind Bike-Sharing Programs Seeks Bankruptcy Protection
